subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After two promising victories to end a five-game Western trip, the Nets have now lost three games in a row after falling in overtime Sunday to the Hawks on Tyronn Lue’s 22-footer at the buzzer.
snippet: After two promising victories to end a five-game Western trip, the Nets have now lost three games in a row after falling in overtime Sunday to the Hawks on Tyronn Lue’s 22-footer at the buzzer.
